result.eng: It scares me to my skin.
result.ga: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.orig: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn orm
result.html: Cuireann sé eagla mo chraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé eagla mo ċraicinn ormIt scares me to my skin.

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
